context: If my son gets this game & a 3D-XL for Xmas, but the other has only a regular DS-XL, can they still play together? or do both need 3DS players?
response: It's a 3DS game, so you need both of them to play together :)

context: Can it fit 6 games along with a thicker stylus? I have an older version of this case that only holds 3 games that fits towards the front
response: I was wrong. Just tried with 6 games and worked !!

context: Will this work with the Iphone 4
response: Yes, it comes with a multiple charger cords. One will fit in your iPhone 4 to charge it and there is one that fits in the smaller opening to allow you to charge the charger to a (Apple works best) wall charger. Hope that helps!!

context: How long is the length of the cord i need one that is at least 6ft
Can you use this with other games on xbox 360?  Or just Modern Warfare 3?
response: It works with all of them, and also has a switch that lets it work with bluetooth devices, like your phone.

context: What is the difference between Saitek Pro Flight Rudder Pedals and Saitek Pro Cessna Rudder Pedals?
response: The Saitek Pro Cessna Rudder Pedals more closely resemble the shape and feel the rudder pedals found in Cessna aircraft.

context: Anyone know if you can swap the art on the stick?
response: it's possible, but i not recommend.

context: Is this the ps vita or ps vita slim? Just making sure!:)
response: It may have been the original when you first asked this question a year ago but I received the slim version when I ordered it this week.   Looking at recent reviews (Sept. 2015) I'm not alone in receiving the slim, unfortunately.

context: it shows the adapter hooked to the t.v, so how do you hook up the cable for your cable t.v, if the input has the apapter in it?
response: I used a cable splitter. One connection for the cable to go to the TV and another for the adapter.

context: Can you Turn off the BackLit LED anytime or no? And does the mouse have LED as well. Can I turn that off as well. What is the warranty on this?
response: You can turn it off but only on the keyboard but it's hard to see the letters when it's off. And the mouse has led but it doesn't turnoff ever and I'll have to check the warranty on it when I get home

context: does it work for elite dangerous
response: Yes, you may find the default mapping not to your liking but that can be easily changed in game

context: Do I need to be hooked up to the internet to play this game? I understand the updates but do I NEED to be online to play the game?
response: No you do not need internet to play this game.

context: Is this stick compatible with the saitek throttle quadrant?
response: I am not sure that it can work with the CH Combatstick.  CH has their own software for programming the devices.  My advice is to go here and ask your questions.      http://www.ch-hangar.com/forum/index.php        Good luck to you.

context: Will this keyboard work with PS2 games (I have an E01 and B01 and play FFXI on it using the PS2 support)?
response: It only works with the standard PS3 controller. It fits exactly onto the top of the controller and does not use the USB port.

context: Can this be used on XBOX Batman Arkham and Fallout?
response: While the arcade stick itself will work with those games, those games are not designed to really work comfortably with the arcade stick.
